ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/xml ns ns2 urn:sap-com:document:sap:soap:functions:mc-style --- ns2#ZWsGeocallEsitoAllegati: { Allegato_01: { TipoAllegato: payload.tipoAllegato, NomeFileOriginale: payload.nomeFileOriginale, NomeFileNormalizzato: payload.nomeFileNormalizzato, Descrizione: payload.descrizione, Formato: payload.formato, Dimensione: payload.dimensione, ContFile: vars.attachmentGeoCall.contFile }, Externalcode: vars.savePratica.externalCode, Notificationnumbersap: vars.savePratica.notificationNumberSap }

logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere"
var logPayload = payload default "" var status = "ok" var msg = "START esitoAllegati to SAP"
--- CustomLogMapper::logger( { correlationId: correlationId, app: app, mule: mule, status: status, message: msg, (payload: logPayload) if (p('log.level') == "DEBUG"), env: p('mule.env') } )]

#[%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere"
var logPayload = payload default "" var status = "ok" var msg = "END esitoAllegati from SAP"
--- CustomLogMapper::logger( { correlationId: correlationId, app: app, mule: mule, status: status, message: msg, (payload: logPayload) if (p('log.level') == "DEBUG"), env: p('mule.env') } )]
